column4: last try =) im trying to reinstall grub after a windows xp install with a live cd, but when i chroot into my old install all the /dev/hdxx devices are gone, so 'grub-install /dev/hda' doesnt work... any clues?
[top] vip3r: sorry must have missed it, hold on
[top] vip3r: oh, he! did you succeed? :)
i used partition magic in windows to create partitions
